content: in this legal case the court ruled that the succession of am has been declared open the court determined the heirs and the assets that make up the community inheritance including jewelry furniture personal effects and a sum of money in a bank account the court ordered the division of the assets with specific items assigned to certain heirs additionally the court ordered the payment of a sum of money to one of the heirs the counterclaims filed by the defendants were dismissed the court applied relevant articles of the civil code in making its decision including the requirement of collation which is the contribution of assets received through donation to the estate the court determined the value of the assets and the amount to be contributed through collation the court also considered improvements made to the property and ordered the payment of a certain amount to one of the heirs finally the court declared the shares of the heirs and the assets that belong to the estate and ordered the payment of the sum of money in the bank account to be divided between the heirs the court also allocated certain items of jewelry and furniture to specific heirs the defendant was ordered to pay the costs of the litigation the court in latina made a final ruling on the proposed claims and rejected the objections the court declared the succession of am who passed away in aprilia on september 30 2009 the court determined the heirs and their shares of the inheritance which includes jewelry furniture personal effects and a sum of money in a bank account the court ordered the collation of the heirs shares of a property in aprilia and the division of the community property the court assigned specific items to the heirs and ordered one of the defendants to pay a sum of money to one of the heirs the court dismissed the counterclaims filed by the defendants and ordered them to pay the litigation costs the court also required a contribution of costs for a technical expert report the ruling was made on july 22 2019
